channel.title: Help with my special bar
channel.description:
hi.. im stuck with adding a new weap special att.. im useing a 667/709 server.. this is wat i have so far but after i compile it, it didnt show the green special att bar..
[code]case 16034: player.setNextAnimation(new Animation(14788)); player.setNextGraphics(new Graphics(1729)); delayNormalHit( weaponId, attackStyle, getMeleeHit( player, getRandomMaxHit(player, weaponId, attackStyle, false, true, 2, true))); target.setNextGraphics(new Graphics(2104)); target.addFreezeDelay(18000); // 18seconds break;[/code]
and this is the special amount: [code]case 16034: return 100;[/code]

item.title: Help with my special bar
item.dc:creator: @sokuamuag sokuamuag
item.description:
@sokuamuag wrote:

hi… im stuck with adding a new weap special att… im useing a 667/709 server… this is wat i have so far but after i compile it, it didnt show the green special att bar…

case 16034: player.setNextAnimation(new Animation(14788)); player.setNextGraphics(new Graphics(1729)); delayNormalHit( weaponId, attackStyle, getMeleeHit( player, getRandomMaxHit(player, weaponId, attackStyle, false, true, 2, true))); target.setNextGraphics(new Graphics(2104)); target.addFreezeDelay(18000); // 18seconds break;

and this is the special amount:

case 16034: return 100;

Read full topic
